column3: Looking to get your hands on some alexandrite, are you? I have a map right here which should lead you to a buried cache. For 75 <hex:023111FF05>Item<hex:04FF06>　28<hex:030203>, it's yours.
Here─sealed for your peace of mind. You may decipher it at your leisure.
You've a mind to acquire some alexandrite, do you? I've none in my possession, but I do have a map or two which might lead you to a cache─provided you can decipher them.
...Judging from the way you cocked your head just now, you haven't the foggiest what I'm talking about. Come back when you do.
You cannot purchase mysterious maps until you have learned the general action <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Decipher<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
To do so, you must first complete the quest “Treasures and Tribulations.”
Much as I'd love to help you indulge your impulses, I cannot sell you another mysterious map until you decipher the one in your possession.
The price is not negotiable─75 <hex:023111FF05>Item<hex:04FF06>　28<hex:030203>, and not one less.
